# GET /v1/merchantIds/{id}/relationships/certificates | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/merchantIds/{id}/relationships/certificates ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates)

-  GET /v1/merchantIds/{id}/relationships/certificates 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/merchantIds/{id}/relationships/certificates

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/merchantIds/{id}/relationships/certificates
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[MerchantIdCertificatesLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/merchantidcertificateslinkagesresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 401 Unauthorized``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Unauthorized`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 403 Forbidden``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Forbidden`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 404 Not Found``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Not Found`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 429 ``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)``

 Content-Type: application/json ## [See Also](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#see-also)

### [Managing merchant IDs](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-merchantIds-_id_-relationships-certificates#Managing-merchant-IDs)

[Managing merchant IDs and Payment Processing certificates](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/managing-payment-processing-certificates)Create and update certificates so your app uses Apple Pay and Wallet.[`List merchant IDs`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-merchantids)List all merchant Ids for your team.[`Read details for a merchant ID`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-merchantids-_id_)Get information for a merchant ID.[`List certificates for a merchant ID`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-merchantids-_id_-certificates)Get a list of all certificates for a specific merchant ID.[`Modify merchant IDs`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-merchantids-_id_)Update a specific merchant ID.[`Create a merchant ID`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/post-v1-merchantids)Add a new merchant ID to your team.[`Delete a merchant ID`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/delete-v1-merchantids-_id_)Delete a specific merchant ID.
